message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product at $11,000. I think it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,500 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,000?
